thread.title: Mrs Janet Clarke
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Janet Clarke

author: Mrs Janet Clarke
title: Mrs Janet Clarke
text: Great choice I made with these blinds. Love the colour and what a great idea with how you can have them open individually different ways. With measurements being in mm's you can get a great fit. I wished I'd ordered mine a couple of mm's wider though. Am still very pleased. Delivery was good. Ordered over the Xmas period so didn't expect them to arrive as quick as they did.
